item.title: Ruby Musings
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
This is where I will share ideas and thoughts on Ruby. My personal blog is "Goff the Top", which is just ideas that come "Off the Top of the Head of Goff". Musings there will likely be silly and whimsical.

Hopefully my Ruby Musings will by better formulated.
